Selamat mampir di Tim Penterjemah Ubuntu Indonesia, dan bagi Anda yang ingin bergabung disini silakan kirimkan email ke l10n@ubuntu-id.org dan sertakan rencana yang ingin Anda lakukan di <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-id|Tim Penterjemah Ubuntu Indonesia]]</nowiki>.

Panduan bagi para penerjemah: http://wiki.ubuntu-id.org/Launchpad/MelakukanTerjemahan, http://www.i15n.org/wiki/Glosarium

Translate Ubuntu into Indonesian language. We provide Indonesian language for Ubuntu linux distribution. Our job description is to translate all the Ubuntu application and all the dependencies. Fell free to join with us...
Thank you for joining the team...
